Response: This year we are raising money for Medical aid for Palestinians, you can donate over at https://tiltify.com/@rollplusbond/roll-bond-6th-anniversary-stream

Stay tuned for info on the Itch bundle which will contain a bunch of games played on this stream and a bunch more made by the Roll +Bond community. You can find us on social media over at https://bsky.app/profile/rollplusbond.com, https://twitter.com/RollPlusBond, https://instagram.com/rollplusbond and https://tumblr.com/rollplusbond
The intermission music is by Devin Nelson (https://devindecibel.bandcamp.com, @devindecibel), Remus (@thelostlarrikin) and Dov (https://dovrymusic.bandcamp.com)
